SectionThree.Paragraph:
Reducing wasted energy is just as crucial 
as producing eco-friendly energy. 
Ninewatt contributes to urban energy efficiency 
and carbon neutrality policies  through D.N.A. (Data,
Network, AI), driving the transformation of smart cities
for a better society.

SectionFive.ParagraphLineOne: Ninewatt addresses energy challenges in buildings and cities
SectionFive.ParagraphLineTwo: by collecting, processing, and analyzing data at multiple scales to discover innovative solutions.

SectionSeven.SubTitleLineOne: Ninewatt focuses on the intersection of ICT technology innovation and social impact,
SectionSeven.SubTitleLineTwo: driving sustainable corporate development and fulfilling our social responsibility.

0.Title: WATTI
0.Description:
A 3D map-based smart city platform
designed to identify and address
urban energy challenges.

1.Title: SAVE-E
1.Description:
A building energy-saving solution
powered by big data analysis,
utilizing minimal customer information.

2.Title: GREEN PLANNER
2.Description:
Utilizes GIS-based simulations and
AI technology to generate optimal
solutions for energy retrofitting.

3.Title: GREEN PLANNER APP
3.Description:
A one-stop remodeling platform
that integrates proptech with
remodeling prediction reports.

4.Title: RE:park
4.Description:
A park facility management system
designed for citizens, administrators,
and maintenance companies.

SectionEight.ResultLineOne: The diverse solutions offered by Ninewatt
SectionEight.ResultLineTwo: are shaping the world we live in, driving

0.Title:
Monitoring and predicting
carbon emissions in 5
cities

2.Title:
Digitizing over 2,000
facilities in targeted areas
(e.g., large parks)

SectionNine.NewsDescription: Discover the latest updates from Ninewatt.

SectionTwo.DescriptionLineOne: Ninewatt is a pioneering social enterprise and venture focused on the environment within ESG management. We focus on the intersection where ICT innovation meets social impact, driving sustainable development and social responsibility for businesses.

Mission.Title: Reduce Wasted Energy to Zer0
Mission.DescriptionLineOne: Just as important as generating eco-friendly energy is reducing
Mission.DescriptionLineTwo: wasted energy. To achieve carbon neutrality, Ninewatt leverages
Mission.DescriptionLineThree: diverse data to derive optimal energy usage solutions.

Vision.Title: A Leading Company in Building Energy-Saving Services
Vision.DescriptionLineOne: Energy is a vital force that powers the infrastructure of society.
Vision.DescriptionLineTwo: Ninewatt strives for technological advancements that protect
Vision.DescriptionLineThree: the sustainable existence, dignity, and value of humanity.

Description.One: We are committed to achieving the
Description.Three: to foster the development of both present and future generations.

CardOne.Title: Environmentally friendly production and consumption of energy
CardOne.Description: Reduction of wasted building energy and improvement of energy efficiency

CardTwo.Title: Climate Change and Response
CardTwo.Description: Mitigating the negative impacts of climate change by reducing greenhouse gas emissions through strategic ideas and initiatives.
